help-file.title: "NEGATIVE ENERGY VORTEX"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Healing
This spell creates an enormous vortex that links directly to the negative material plane. All of the casters' enemies are sucked in for a split second and subjected to the ravaging effects of the raw negative energy bombardment. The casters' allies then gain the energy that their enemies have lost.
